Hugh Exton (ụbọchị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1864 Western Cape rụọ afọ 1955) bụ onye South Africa na-ese foto nke onwe ya nke a maara n'ihe banyere ịmepụta ihe karịrị glass slide puku iri abụọ na atọ n'oge ọrụ ya site n'afọ 1892 ruo 1945, ma chekwaa ya na Hugh Exton Photographic Museum, nke bụbu ụlọ ụka Dutch Reformed nke e wuru na Pietersburg n'ime afọ1890s. Ọ bụ nwa dọkịta, anthropologist, geologist na onye nchịkọta, Hugh Exton (afọ 1833 rụọ afọ 1903) F.G.S., onye bụ onye isi oche nke South African Geological Society site na ntọala ya n'afọ 1895, na Jacomina Hendrina van der Poel.

Exton si n'ebe ugwu Cape Town n'afọ 1886, na-eleta Marabastad Goldfields dị nso na Pietersburg, mesịa biri n'obodo ahụ n'afọ 1899. O sere foto dịgasị iche iche nke ihe omume akụkọ ihe mere eme, gụnyere Agha Anglo-Boer, na-edekọ ndị nkịtị na ndị ama ama na uwe nke oge ahụ, ihe owuwu nke oge ahụ، yana foto nke ụlọ ọrụ na azụmahịa mpaghara
O debere ihe edeturu nke ọma n'akwụkwọ nhọpụta, na-edekọ nkọwa nke foto ọ bụla o sere
E mepụtara ihe osise Exton nke ụmụ agbọghọ dandies na uwe atọ, di na nwunye na-ahụ n'anya na ndị ọrụ ugbo siri ike na ụlọ ọrụ ya n'ihe dị ka mmalite nke narị afọ nke iri abuo
Nchịkọta ihe oyiyi ya na-achọpụta afọ irí isé mbụ nke Pietersburg.
Otu foto album nke nwere ihe osise ndị Exton sere ma dee ihe ncheta nke Northern Transvaalão ka Pietersburg Zionist Society nyere Chaim Weizmann n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1932.
